title: Better education likely to boost per capita income

content.prompt: An increase in which of the following is most likely to increase the long-run growth rate of an economy's real per capita income?

choices.label: The proportion of gross domestic product consumed

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
